input.sentences: the old location location town 's cemetery is oddly comforting and quiet in the deep january snow .
the town boasts many charming old houses .
this is an old two story home that housed soldiers during the civil war .
the creek that runs behind the house proved useful in keeping soldiers hydrated .
the town also has modern amenities such as a fully functioning fire department .
output.sentences: The cemetery was silent and still in the newly fallen snow.
The old caretaker's cottage, which had creaked and groaned through the storm, sat silent.
Ice formed on the sidewalk outside the house down the road.
The river had nearly frozen over along the back of the cemetery.
The chief at the fire station sipped his coffee waiting for any emergency calls after the storm.
